create.endWithSaveBtn: Save and go back to purposes

nameField.label: Purpose name (required)
nameField.infoLabel: It will help you tell them apart

dailyCallsField.label: Number of API calls/day (required)
dailyCallsField.infoLabel: Your estimate of API calls/day you will make. This value will contribute to the E-Service Provider threshold to guarantee the Provider's infrastructure can sustain the load. If this value goes over any of the threshold, the Provider will approve this purpose manually before it goes into effect

step2.title: Risk analysis
step2.description: The questions below will change based on the answers provided. If you edit an answer above, it may change the following questions

quickPublish.title: Quick publish options
quickPublish.description: If you are done editing, you can publish this draft immediately, or delete it. If you want to publish later, just save the draft above or leave this page
